row.name: Perception
row.comment: Perception measures your ability to be aware of your environment. Every creature has Perception, which works with and is limited by a creatureâ€™s senses

row.name: Hit points
row.comment: Your maximum Hit Point value represents your health, wherewithal, and heroic drive when you are in good health and rested.
Creatures cannot be reduced to fewer than 0 Hit Points.

row.name: Immunities
row.comment: List of immunities to damage types, specific conditions or effects.

row.name: Weaknesses and resistances
row.comment: Dictionary of {damage type or damage source: damage modifier}, where (damage bonus) = weakness, (damage penalty) = resistance or hardness of item.

row.name: Active afflictions
row.comment: Dictionary of {active affliction: [onset period, current stage, remained duration]}

row.name: Active conditions
row.comment: Dictionary of {active condition: [condition value, remained duration]}

row.name: Hero points
row.comment: Your heroic deeds earn you Hero Points, which grant you good fortune or let you recover from the brink of death. Unlike most aspects of your character, which persist over the long term, Hero Points last for only a single session.
Hero points = 1 at the start of a session. Maximum 3 hero points at a time.

row.name: Speed of character
row.comment: Land speed, which indicates how quickly they can move across the ground.

row.name: Special speed of character
row.comment: Burrow speed: lets you tunnel through the ground. Burrowing doesn't normally leave behind a tunnel.
Climb speed: allows you to move up or down inclines and vertical surfaces.
Fly speed: you can use the Fly and Arrest a Fall actions.
Swim speed: you can propel yourself through the water with little impediment.
